attributes.action: 🔒 Armed forces or trained armed security at every school entrance
attributes.additional_details:
• Banks and government buildings get protection — so should our kids 

Help us demand action from:
📍 Local School Board or Council Name?
📍 Your MP or Education Department?

📢 Let’s keep our children safe — before it’s too late.

🖊️ SIGN TODAY — YOUR VOICE MATTERS!
attributes.background:
Present all day, every day during school hours and events. Professionally trained, licensed, and equipped. Specialised in child safety, crisis response, and de-escalation


 • Armed threats to schools are real and rising
 • Response time can save lives — deterrence is key

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Fund security guards and CCTV on school premises & introduce new protocols 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/738547
